comment: Shows two different remaining credit amounts, while I know for a fact that I'm already over my limit. Garbage app, don't bother.

author: Bankeen Mustafa
comment: I have been using this app since I bought Base SIM card. It doesn't update my data consumption, instead of that, I log out and re-log in to see my latest consumption state. Overall, I don't see my credit value in latest updates any more.

reply.author: Telenet Group
reply.content: Hi Mustafa, Thank you for your feedback. The app can take up to 2 hours to process your usage, but this is mostly done after 30 minutes. Login and sign out should not be necessary. You can send us an e-mail for further support to myapp@telenetgroup.be. Abdel

author: Kkcio Kktus
comment: Everytime I use it requies update an reconfiguration of the account. Completely useless. I stopped using it.

author: Andrea Caniato
comment: registration doesn't work even after new install in android device

reply.author: Telenet Group
reply.content: Hello Andrea, sorry for the delay. If you already had a login, you don't need to register anymore. Did you contact 1999 or myapp@telenetgroup.be to check with our colleagues? Don't hesitate ;-) Have a nice day, Sylvain

author: Eeden
comment: Downloaded it despite the negative feedback should've listened

reply.author: Telenet Group
reply.content: Hello Eeden, Can you provide us some details, please? You can contact us by sending an e-mail to myapp@telenetgroup.be. I'll be happy to help you out. Abdel

author: Wouter Lelong
comment: Sinds een update kan ik het resterende belkrediet niet meer raadplegen. Als oplossing wordt voorgesteld dat je dat toch kan raadplegen via sms of door te bellen. Waardeloze app dus!   ---------- Antwoord op Abdel: Na telefonische bevestiging dat dit verwijderd was en zeker niet meer ging teruggezet worden, dan toch iemand die wél weet hoe het werkt! Bedankt Abdel!

reply.author: Telenet Group
reply.content: Hallo Wouter, Fijn om te horen dat het opgelost is. Hartelijk bedankt voor je complimentje! :-) Groet, Abdel

author: Sophie Loe
comment: . The design and layout is very easy to use. New payment plan boasts 15€ and can configure mins and data, except this doesn't work: The next screen gives option to conform change to base15 bit no config option, so I didn't change plan.

author: Roger Hamelers
comment: Worked once, now keeps saying. "We can't find this account". My first month with Base and they sent me a text claiming I was over my monthly limit (even though I now have 5x more than last month with Proximus and then I never ever went over my limit).

author: William Buttner II
comment: Doesn't actually keep track of data properly. Had to pay 400 Euros overage after it said I only used 13GB of data. Company claimed I used 30GB. That's after I switched my plan to double my data. Still had to pay it.

author: Pascal Delvenne
comment: If you are a heavy traveller count on the inability of this app to inform you in real time about your data usage and get prepared for insane bills upon return (in hundreds of Euro).

author: Relio Abito
comment: login door middel van mobiel netwerk is defect. update aub.

author: Claudio Soares
comment: Not working properly...

author: christo4232
comment: Worked for a while, quite handy. Since several months, however, i can no longer log in through any of the provided methods, nor change the password

author: Soraya Bel
comment: Not bad. It took me a while to get used to the display but I find the app useful to monitor my budget and invoices.

author: tolis papastolopoulos
comment: Can't login at all, either with credentials or using the network and the app logs me out all the time....

author: Ashish Vaidya
comment: Doesn't even go past terms and conditions page on my nexus 5

author: Alex Dębowski
comment: It always logs you out, and it's impossible to reset your password if you forgot it. Takes time to properly monitor you balance, just lags a ton. Just not as functional and reliable as you would expect it to be.

author: Bas van der Peet
comment: Login is problematic, doesn't remember credentials. Login via mobile network times out when you're on WiFi. Paid invoices still show up as unpaid.

author: Mado Shkhaes
comment: It's werk well
Only adds

author: AB ARABZAI
comment: Better then

author: Wont Sayu
comment: App doesnt work as i tebded . Get some app devs please ... so annoying

author: Tutku Karabel
comment: Nice app indeed

reply.author: Telenet Group
reply.content:
Hello Tutku, Thank you for your nice feedback !!!
Kind regards, Yoann, BASE

author: Sergeipage Larrybrin
comment: Broken app with limited functions; even the limited functions don't work properly. Just a waste of space. Totally useless

author: Na Iliass
comment: Never wotks ,get some real app developpers

author: Elieser Schvarcz
comment: Crappy app. Doesn't do what it's supposed to do. Data doesn't update even with latest app update. Stuck at usage of begin of March!

author: Camila Pecanha
comment: Data doesn't update

author: Tirtsah Pappenheim
comment: I was always very happy with the app but now it hasnt been up to date as it still shows me February and its being troublesome! I have already reinstalled the app but it didnt help Please do something about it as i want to continue using the app! Thanks

author: William Hennico
comment: Data never update. Not user-friendly.

author: Ben Opiniano
comment: Data were never up to date :-(

author: Efrina Ndindi
comment: Not up to date

author: Maria Sangwo
comment: Information not updated on time, so not reliable. App not flexible, cannot be adjusted to ones needs i.e. would like to be able to see more detailed info reg calls and data usage.

author: Anastasija Ozueh
comment: I don't have any trouble with this app. Works perfectly, dont see a reason not to give 5.  Samsung Galaxy Note 3.

author: Ahmer Shafi
comment: Zeer handig, zeker voor niet onbepaald klanten.

author: Raffi Ksp
comment: Junk nothing works.

author: David Nugent
comment: App doesn't work. Haven't been able to login for a long time. Tells me my account doesn't exist. Strange that I can login on desktop. Login with mobile network doesn't work either. Useless app.

reply.author: Telenet Group
reply.content: Hi David, thank you for your feedback. If you can't login, can you please call us for free on 1999? We'll find a solution for you. Kr, David - BASE

author: Patrick Szpyra
comment: Cant use it. It says that the number format is wrong while I dont have any problems to log in on the homepage.

reply.author: Telenet Group
reply.content: Hello Patrick, did you try with this format 04xxxxxxxx? If you are still unable to login, please call us for free on 1999. Kr, David - BASE

author: Mushegh Yekmalyan
comment: More recent update you can see in the websiye and the app is very late to deliver the latest data

author: djipi boto
comment: La mise à jour des infos dure trop longtemps.

reply.author: Telenet Group
reply.content: Bonjour djipi boto, un délai est nécessaire en fonction de l'usage effectué et des session en cours. Si le délai est trop important, n'hésitez pas à contacter le service clientèle en appelant gratuitement le 1999 afin de vérifier ceci pour vous. Bàv, Redouan, BASE.

comment: Werkt niet
